altTitles.ja: マッスル朝鮮

description.en:
“Huh?! Kyaaaaak!!! W-Why did I suddenly become an anchovy?!!!”

He majors in food and nutrition and has a first-class certificate as a daily sports instructor, the epitome of being a fitness enthusiast, Choi Young-jik! Well, that was who he used to be…

Waking up in the body of Prince Soo-yang, the second son of King Se-jong the Great, he lost all of his bulging muscles overnight.

Young-jik was taken aback when he realized he might be able to meet King Se-jong, his father. He couldn’t contain his excitement at the thought of meeting the magnificent King Se-jong, whether or not it was a dream or reality.

H-Huh? King Se-jong… the Great???

There sits in front of him, a chubby man who looks like he’s struggling to breath.

King Se-jong the Great appears to be severely obese and possibly diabetic… Government officials had chronic illnesses and frail bodies… Choi Young-jik, a seasoned fitness trainer with 15 years under his belt- holding the pride of the fitness community- begins to feel a fire ignite inside him.

“Alright, shall I try spreading the fitness craze in Joseon?!”
Indeed it is, indeed it does. A street action comic featuring the life of Jang Gwangnam leading up to the creation of the Killberos Tribe.

title.en: Danshi Kokoseidakedo Gyaru ni TS Shimashita

altTitles.ja: 男子高校生だけどギャルにTSしました

altTitles.ja-ro: Danshi Koukousei Dakedo Gal ni TS Shimashita

altTitles.en: I'm a High School Boy, but I Got Gender-Swapped into a Gyaru

altTitles.pt-br: Eu sou um Garoto do Ensino médio, mas troquei de Gênero e Me Tornei uma Gal

description.en:
Junpei, a loner high schooler, became a gyaru after saving the god of gyaru from drowning. Through his mother's connections, he was able to transfer to an all-girls school, but it was stuffed to the brim with gyarus! Every day is a sensory overload for Shunpei, who's never even talked to a girl, let alone a gyaru.
___
 [Alternative Official Raw (NicoNico)](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67976)
description.ja: 陰キャ男子・桜井は、目の前で溺れていたギャル神様を助けた恩恵でギャルになってしまった。母親の伝手で転校することができたが、その学校はギャルだらけの女子校だった！ギャルどころか女子とまともに交流したことがない桜井にとって刺激が強すぎる毎日…。
description.pt-br:
Shunpei, um estudante solitário do ensino médio, se tornou uma gal depois de salvar a deusa das gals de se afogar. Através das conexões de sua mãe, ele conseguiu transferir-se para uma escola só para meninas, mas estava cheia de gals!
 Todos os dias são uma sobrecarga sensorial para Shunpei, que nunca falou com uma garota, muito menos com uma gal.
 
 É o início de uma comédia escolar engraçada, com um cara introvertido do ensino médio => transformado em Gal.

altTitles.en: The New Daughter-in-Law of the Villain Family

description.en: Luciel, a Crystal Fairy skilled in crafting jewels from her emotions, returns to the past after a life cut short by betrayal. Armed with the knowledge of a grim future, she proposes a contract marriage to the empire’s most villainous family. What begins as a desperate strategy to escape her fate soon becomes an adventure filled with unexpected warmth. Can Luciel rewrite her story, or will her past come back to haunt her?

title.en: Cheat Mode Farming in Another World

altTitles.ja: ゆるふわ農家の文字化けスキル ~異世界でカタログ通販やってます~

altTitles.ja-ro: Yurufuwa Nouka no Mojibake Skill ~Isekai de Catalog Tsuuhan Yattemasu~

altTitles.id: Bertani di Dunia Lain Dengan Mode Cheat

altTitles.pt-br: Agricultura no modo cheat em outro mundo

altTitles.es: Habilidades Trampa de Granja en Otro Mundo

description.en:
Tatsuya, a 29-year-old bachelor, gets accidentally summoned to another world and obtains [Agricultural Skills]. 

In order to survive, he starts a vegetable garden in a secluded forest. He thought that his life in another world would be extremely difficult, but the ingredients in this other world were delicious and the crops he grew on his own were also very delicious! Furthermore, he's also very happy with the dishes he made with Japanese seasonings! 

(Typical. Rice and sake are going to be a staple apparently, but you guys know the drill. )

Besides, if there are beautiful brides, isn't it okay if he lives in this other world? Loose and fluffy, a relaxing other world harem life!
description.es: Tatsuya, un soltero de 29 años, es invocado a otro mundo por alguna razón y debido a eso logra despertar [Habilidades agrícolas]. Inicia un huerto para sobrevivir en un bosque remoto. "Creo que vivir en un mundo diferente es extremadamente difícil, y aunque los ingredientes en él suelen ser deliciosos, mis propios productos agrícolas también son muy deliciosos. Además, estoy muy satisfecho con los platos elaborados con condimentos japoneses, el arroz y sake son deliciosos. Y si hay novias hermosas, ¿no hace que este mundo sea aun mejor?" ¡Viviendo una vida relajada y acaramelada con su harem en un mundo diferente!
description.pt-br: Um homem solteiro de 29 anos é invocado para outro mundo. recebendo uma habilidade de agricultura level 1. Crie uma casa, faça uma horta e viva uma tranquila vida isolada na floresta. Com bebidas e comidas deliciosas de sua colheita e lindas garotas, não tem coisa melhor.

altTitles.ja: 宝石商のメイド

description.en:
Rorstein's jewelry store is an unusual store where "maids sell jewelry".
The store, on the main street, is visited by an elderly gentleman, an aristocrat, an actress, a poor student, and all sorts of people who have heard the rumor. When they pick up the jewelry chosen by the waitresses, their own lives also begin to shine.

A story told by jewelry and people.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Note: A series of jewelry and short stories with delicate illustrations.
description.ja:
宝石商「ローシュタイン」は“メイドが宝石を売る”一風変わった品揃えのお店。
大通りから外れたその店には、老紳士、貴族、女優、貧乏学生と噂を聞きつけたさまざまな人が訪れる。
メイドが選んだ宝石を手にしたとき、彼ら自身の人生もまた輝きだす。
宝石と人が紡ぐ物語。
ーー繊細なイラストで贈る珠玉の連作短編。

altTitles.ja: 怪異さんと俺

description.en:
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/24367326/series/222807)

**Notes:**
- The Pixiv series does not contain all of the chapters and combines some. Do not follow the chapter numbering on Pixiv. Instead, enable Japanese chapters on MangaDex to see the proper chapter order and links to all of the raw chapters.
- This series uses characters the author used in illustrations beforehand.
description.ja: 俺くんと怪異さんのお話。
description.zh: 拥有灵感的少年因为能看见一般人看不见的妖怪而受排挤，于是他选择和妖怪们成为朋友的故事。

altTitles.ja: ナイトメア・メーカー

altTitles.ja-ro: Sekai wa Subete Kimi no Mono

description.en: Uchida is a high school student genius who created a device that is supposed to make people have good dreams but he always had bad dreams when he tried it on himself. One day, he caught the school doctor sleeping at the clinic and decided to try the device on her. It turned out that it works surprisingly well on her and that she wanted to buy the device from him. He then tries it on his classmates and it became quite popular with the rest of the class as people start lining up to borrow it. Meanwhile, there is growing concern that users of the device are starting to have difficulties differentiating dreams from reality…
description.ja: 天才発明家高校生の内田は､夢に願望を投影できる夢見装置を開発｡誰もが装置の虜になっていく､レム催眠誘導型リアル体感システム始動!!

altTitles.ja: 蟻の王

description.en: A talented nobody feels as if there's no challenge to him in this life. He feels as if life is too easy. But little does he know, his background actually holds more than he ever wished for. Can he face his destiny and accept what has been laid before him?

altTitles.ja: 伝説の男の娘もっこり配信者

description.en:
A femboy shows off his bulge on a livestream!!

However, it gets even more popular than he expected?!

---

* Alternative Official Raw - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mukunozaltusou/status/1844651030761685297)
description.id: Seorang cowok cantik mencoba mengolok-olok penonton om-om dengan Steaming sambil cross-dressing dan memamerkan tubuh montoknya!! Namun, tidak disangka dia mendapatkan popularitas karena hal lain...!?
description.ja:
配信でもっこりを見せつける男の娘‼

しかし、それが以外にも人気が出てしまい…⁉

title.en: Inkya Datta Ore no Seishun Revenge: Tenshi sugiru Ano Ko to Ayumu Re Life

altTitles.ja: 陰キャだった俺の青春リベンジ 天使すぎるあの娘と歩むReライフ

altTitles.en: The Revenge of My Youth: My Re Life with a Girl Who Was Too Much of an Angel

altTitles.ru: Месть моей юности: Моя жизнь с девушкой, которая была слишком похожа на ангела

altTitles.vi: Sống Lại Tuổi Thanh Xuân: Cuộc Sống Thứ Hai Bên Thiếu Nữ Tựa Thiên Thần

description.en:
This is the story of Niihama Shincirou, who collapsed after being ravaged by a black company and woke up to find that he had been sent back to his second year of high school. When he wakes up, he finds himself in a time leap to his second year of high school. His high school life... was gray and shady, but he’s sure he can start over now.

The beautiful girl of his dreams, Haruka Shijouin, whom he met again over time, is even more innocent and cute than he remembered, and above all, she has been staring straight at Niihama.

*"I feel like you've changed a lot from the Niihama I knew yesterday. You're still kind, but you’ve grown up, and that's wonderful!"*

If I could change the future, I would definitely save her life after she took her own life after being severely bullied. With the adult mentality and corporate power that I’ve acquired, I’m going to take my revenge on my second youth with her–!
description.id: bercerita tentang seorang budak korporat bernama Niihama Shincirou yang bekerja di perusahaan gelap dia pingsan setelah kelelahan bekerja dan ketika terbangun ia terkejut karena ternyata dia mengalami lompatan waktu dan kembali ke masa di mana dia masih seorang murid SMA. lalu karena dia sudah kembali ke masa lalu dia bertekad untuk balas dendam dengan menjadi lebih aktif dan berjuang untuk mendapatkan hal yang dia inginkan tidak peduli siapapun lawannya sampai pada akhirnya menebus semua penyesalan yang telah ia lakukan di kehidupan sebelumnya...
description.ja: サラリーマン・新浜心一郎は度重なるブラック残業の果てに遂に倒れ、目が覚めると高校生に！？　陰キャだったかつての自分と決別し、憧れだった美少女・紫条院春華を待ち受ける悲劇の未来から救うため奔走する――！
description.vi:
Chuyển thể từ Light Novel cùng tên

Đây là câu chuyện về Niihama Shincirou, người đã suy sụp sau khi bị dày vò bởi một công ty đen và tỉnh dậy thì thấy rằng mình đã bị gửi trở lại năm thứ hai trung học. Cuộc sống trung học của cậu ấy… thật xám xịt và mờ ám, nhưng cậu chắc chắn rằng mình có thể bắt đầu lại ngay bây giờ.
Cô gái xinh đẹp trong mộng của cậu, Haruka Shijouin, người mà cậu đã gặp lại, thậm chí còn ngây thơ và dễ thương hơn những gì cậu nhớ, và trên hết, cô ấy đã nhìn thẳng vào Niihama.

“Tớ cảm thấy như cậu đã thay đổi rất nhiều so với Niihama mà tớ biết ngày hôm qua. Cậu vẫn tốt bụng, nhưng đã trưởng thành, và điều đó thật tuyệt!”
description.pt-br:
Niihama Shinichirou, o qual desmaiou após ser explorado ao extremo por uma ‘companhia exploradora’ e ao acordar descobriu que havia sido mandado de volta para o segundo ano do ensino médio. Sua vida escolar foi sombria e melancólica… No entanto, ele tem certeza de que agora pode recomeçar.
Haruka Shijouin, uma linda garota que ele conheceu antes, de repente parece ainda mais inocente e bonita do que Shinichirou se lembrava, e acima de tudo, ela olha diretamente para ele… 

“Eu sinto que você está bem diferente do Niihama que eu conhecia ontem. Você continua gentil, mas você cresceu, e isso é maravilhoso!” 

Se eu pudesse mudar o futuro, eu definitivamente iria salvá-la depois que ela tirou a própria vida após sofrer severamente por conta de bullying. Com a mentalidade adulta e poderes corporativos que adquiri, eu vou me vingar da minha segunda juventude com ela–!

description.en:
The first-generation hunter and the hero who established all monster subjugation systems and frameworks, Kim Jun-woo, finally defeats Gigantiana in the subjugation of the Black Grave Dungeon. However, he also loses his life in the process.

As his breath fades, he hears the voice of Gigantiana...

altTitles.ja: はらぺこ母娘と元カレ家主

altTitles.ja-ro: Hara peko Oyako to Motokare Yanushi

altTitles.en: A Hungry Mother and Daughter and Her Ex-Boyfriend Landlord

altTitles.pt-br: Uma mãe faminta, sua filha e seu ex-namorado proprietário

description.en:
36-year-old Takaharu lives alone. After graduating from Art College, he has been living a quiet life while painting pictures. 

One day, his ex-girlfriend Kyou, whom he broke up with 17 years ago, comes to him with her daughter Minori and asks him to let them stay at his place. As in their college days, 

Kyou is attracted by the delicious food, and so the three of them begin to live together!
description.ja: 36歳のたかはるは一人暮らし。美大を卒業後、ほそぼそと絵を描いて暮らしていた。そんなある日、17年前に別れた元カノ・キョウが娘のみのりを連れてやってきて「居候をさせて欲しい」という。大学時代同様においしい食べ物につられたキョウにほだされ、三人での生活が始まるが……？
description.pt-br: Takaharu, de 36 anos, mora sozinho. Depois de se formar na Art College, ele vive uma vida tranquila enquanto pinta quadros. Um dia, sua ex-namorada Kyou, com quem ele terminou há 17 anos, vem até ele com sua filha Minori e pede que ele as deixe ficar em sua casa. Assim como nos tempos de faculdade, Kyou se sente atraída pela comida deliciosa, e assim os três passam a morar juntos.

altTitles.ja: 勇者くんは旅立てない

description.en: The Hero is expected by God and the People to defeat the Demon King!! And now its time to set out!! ...But before he can he is tempted by a thick sexy bunny girl! At the mercy of the Bunny girl's wiles he is unable to depart... Furthermore a Priest of the church charms him with her night skills... Will the Hero ever be able to set out on his journey?
description.ja: 勇者は神と人々から期待を受け魔王討伐のため、いざ！旅立ちの時！！…が出発前に出会った、むちむちお色気バニーガールお姉さんから数々の誘惑を受けてしまう！バニーさんの手練手管に翻弄され出発はままならず…。さらに教会より派遣された僧侶に夜のスキルで魅了され…。果たして勇者は旅立てるのかーー！

title.en: Sesesese! ~Mezase Hatsu H! Doutei Joshi no Tokimeki Daisakusen~

altTitles.ja: せせせせ！～目指せ初H！童貞女子のときめき大作戦～

altTitles.ja-ro: Sesesese! ～Mezase Hatsu H! Doutei Joshi no Tokimeki Daisakusen～

altTitles.en: Sesesese! ~Aiming For My First Time! A Virgin Girl's Heart-Pounding Grand Strategy~

description.en: A high-energy sexually-charged comedy! Nagara Ayano, who has transformed from a virgin college student into a female version of his middle school self, blindly rushes in headfirst to try and achieve his first sexual experience, but things aren't going as smoothly as he'd hope...!

Jake, a seemingly average office worker, unexpectedly finds himself thrust into a fantasy world teeming with dangers and opportunities. Rather than succumbing to fear, Jake thrives in this unfamiliar realm. As he navigates the expansive multiverse, his power grows and he transforms—evolving from a mundane office worker into a true apex hunter.

altTitles.ja: ゴーストフィクサーズ

description.en: Following a certain event, Mikurigaoka New Town transformed into a crucible of supernatural phenomena known as GHOSTS! In said town lives Hifumi, a middle school boy, who one day encounters a girl who just moved in... Help "correct" the supernatural in this action-packed tale from Yasuki Tanaka, creator of "Summer Time Rendering"!

altTitles.ja: ワンピース

description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty-two years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

---

**Note:**  
**Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MangaPlus for free by clicking the chapter links below.**

---
- **The Best-Selling Manga in History**
- **Won the 41st Japan Cartoonists Association Award Grand Prize alongside Neko Darake in 2012** 
- **Received the Kumamoto Prefecture Honorary Prize in 2018**
description.es: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.ru: Последние слова, произнесённые Королем Пиратов Гол Д. Роджером перед казнью, вдохновили многих выйти в море: «Мои сокровища? Я завещаю их тому, кто сможет их найти. Ищите! Я все оставил в одном месте!». Лишённые сна и покоя люди ринулись на Гранд Лайн, самое опасное место в мире. Так началась великая эра пиратов… Но с каждым годом романтиков становилось все меньше, их постепенно вытесняли прагматичные пираты-разбойники, которым награбленное добро было куда ближе, чем какие-то «никчёмные мечты». Но вот, одним прекрасным днем, семнадцатилетний Монки Д. Луффи исполнил заветную мечту детства - отправился в море. Его цель — ни много, ни мало стать новым Королём Пиратов. За достаточно короткий срок юному капитану удаётся собрать команду, состоящую из не менее амбициозных искателей приключений. И пусть ими движут совершенно разные устремления, главное, этим ребятам важны не столько деньги и слава, сколько куда более ценное – принципы и верность друзьям. И ещё – служение Мечте. Что же, пока по Гранд Лайн плавают такие люди, Великая Эра Пиратов всегда будет с нами!
description.uk:
Король піратів Ґолд Роджер буде страчений Світовим урядом. Прямо перед смертю він підтвердив існування великого скарбу «Ван Піс», який знаходиться десь на величезному морі Ґранд Лайн. Як тільки Роджер сказав, що будь-хто гідний досягти Ван Пісу може забрати його собі, його стратили, і почалася Велика ера піратів.

Двадцять два роки потому, молодий хлопець на ім’я Монкі Д. Луффі готовий почати свою пригоду по пошуку Ван Пісу та здобуванню титулу Короля піратів. Маючи при собі солом’яну шапку, невеличкий човен та еластичне тіло, він вирушає у неймовірну подорож, щоб зібрати собі команду та хороший корабель, який зможе пронести їх через весь Ґранд Лайн, щоб стати найвеличнішими в усіх морях.
description.es-la: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.pt-br: One Piece começa quando Gol D. Roger, o Rei Dos Piratas que possuiu tudo nesse mundo, antes de ser executado, diz que escondeu o seu tesouro em algum lugar da Grand Line, um oceano extremamente perigoso. Desde então muitos piratas se aventuram pela Grand Line para tentar encontrar o tesouro chamado One Piece. Um deles é Monkey D. Luffy, o garoto que, acidentalmente, comeu uma das Akuma No Mi, a Gomu Gomu No Mi (Fruta da Borracha), e agora ele pode esticar seu corpo como se fosse uma borracha. A jornada dele começa atrás de companheiros e um barco, que ele vai conseguindo pouco a pouco, pois tem um objetivo: Ser o Rei Dos Piratas!!

title.en: Yuusha-sama wa Houshuu ni Hitozuma wo go Kibou desu

altTitles.ja: 勇者さまは報酬に人妻をご希望です

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuusha-sama wa Houshuu ni Hitozuma o go Kiboudesu

altTitles.en: The Hero Wants a Married Woman as a Reward

description.en:
The hero, Chloe, is a strange hero who demands a bounty when saving people. And what makes it different is the prize... He only likes married women, so he demands the prettiest Milf in town.

**"If you want me to save the city, give me your most beautiful married woman!"**

 A unique erotic fantasy story created by a hero!
description.id:
Pahlawan ini keji...!!  Pahlawan, Chloe, adalah pahlawan aneh yang menuntut hadiah saat menyelamatkan orang. Dan yang membuatnya berbeda adalah hadiahnya...Dia hanya senang dengan wanita yang sudah menikah, jadi dia menuntut Milf yang paling cantik di kota. 

"Jika kau ingin aku menyelamatkan kota, berikan aku milf yang paling cantik" 

Sebuah cerita unik fantasi erotis yang dibuat oleh pahlawan!
description.ja: この勇者、下劣ッ…！！勇者・クロエは人々を救う際に報酬を要求する、異質な勇者だった。そして彼が異質なのはその報酬であった…彼は人妻にしか興奮しない為、その町で一番美しい人妻を要求するのであった。「町を救ってほしければ、一番美しい人妻を寄越せ」異色の勇者がおりなすエロファンタジー！

altTitles.ja: なでしこドレミソラ

description.en:
Miya Nekoma made a bold high school debut in an attempt to change from her once "infamously" boring self. As a part of the change, she decided to join the school's Light Music Club, but on her way to sign up she is intercepted by the energetic shakuhachi flute player Hiyo Takemi who introduces her to the world of Wagakki, or traditional Japanese instruments. After the two attend a concert from one of Japan's leading traditional/modern fusion bands, Miya becomes enamored with the Tsugaru-shamisen, a three stringed lute.  
  
With Hiyo by her side, Miya delves into the world of traditional Japanese music as new acquaintances and friends help to make her dream of sharing the sound she loves a reality.

altTitles.en: Finding Avalon: The Quest of a Chaosbringer

altTitles.ja: 災悪のアヴァロン
災悪のアヴァロン～ゲーム最弱の悪役デブに転移したけど、俺だけ“やせれば強くてニューゲーム”な世界だったので、最速レベルアップ＆破滅フラグ回避で影の英雄を目指します～

description.en:
The main character loves the MMORPG game called Dungeon Explorer Chronicle (Dun-Ex). During one particular day, a beta test event was announced, and he managed to beat it.
In exchange for clearing the event, he was granted permission to try the beta test server.
Forcing to choose different avatar and skill as the system doesn't allow his own, he eventually settled on random. However, he is transferred to a place where, as expected, he finds a fat, villainous mob character...!

title.en: The Lecture You Would Never Want Your Parents to Give You

altTitles.ja: 親に絶対されたくない説教

altTitles.fr: Le sermon que vous ne voudriez jamais recevoir de vos parents

altTitles.ru: Лекция, которую вы бы не хотели услышать от родителей

altTitles.vi: Bài Thuyết Giáo mà ta Không bao giờ Muốn nghe từ phụ Huynh

altTitles.es-la: El regaño que nunca quisieras recibir de tus padres
La charla que nunca quieres que te den tus padres.

altTitles.pl: Wykład, którego nie chciałbyś od rodziców

title.en: Lies of the Sheriff Evans: Dead or Love

altTitles.ja-ro: Hoankan Evans no Uso - Dead or Love

altTitles.ja: 保安官エヴァンスの嘘
保安官エヴァンスの嘘 ～DEAD OR LOVE～

description.en: The story follows lawman Elmore Evans, who despite being one of the most amazing gunslingers in the West can't get rid of his bad luck in his romantic life.
description.ru: Шериф Элмор Эванс, слывущий на Диком Западе искусным стрелком, вечно терпит поражение в любви.

title.en: See You Tomorrow At The Food Court.

altTitles.es-la: Hasta mañana en la plaza de comidas
Nos vemos mañana en la plaza de comidas
Te veo mañana en la plaza de comidas

altTitles.ja: フードコートで、また明日。
フードコートで女子高生が喋るだけ

altTitles.en: See You at the Food Court Tomorrow.

description.en: Yamamoto and Wada are two childhood friends attending different high schools who convene every afternoon at the food court at their local mall to engage in blissfully mundane conversations.
description.es-la:
Yamamoto y Wada son dos amigas de la infancia que atienden diferentes escuelas preparatorias y que se reúnen todas las tardes en la plaza de comidas del centro comercial local para tener charlas encantadoramente mundanas.  
  
[Author Twitter](https://twitter.com/_71416)

altTitles.ja: サタノファニ
Satanofani

description.en: A mysterious syndrome turns schoolgirls into homicidal monsters behind numerous atrocities in Japan. However, nothing is what it seems and when Chika Amagi is arrested for the brutal murder of five people.
description.es: Un misterioso síndrome convierte a las colegialas en monstruos homicidas detrás de numerosas atrocidades en Japón. Sin embargo, nada es lo que parece y cuando Chika Amagi es arrestado por el brutal asesinato de cinco personas, ¡comienza un viaje a aguas desconocidas y turbulentas!
description.fr:
Au Japon, un mystérieux syndrome transforme les écolières d'un établissement en monstres sanguinaires, capables de tuer leurs semblables avec un sang-froid incroyable. Dans cette période de trouble, Chika Amagi, étudiante sans histoire, est arrêtée pour le meurtre terrible de cinq personnes…   


---
description.ja: 活発で食いしん坊な、普通の女の子だったはずの彼女は、ある事件をきっかけに「羽黒刑務所」へと導かれる。島に建てられたその刑務所には、メデューサ症候群と呼ばれる殺人少女たちだけが集められているのであった。彼女たちに宿る凶悪とは――!?
description.pt-br: Uma síndrome misteriosa torna jovens garotas em monstros homicidas por trás de diversas atrocidades no Japão. Entretanto, nada é o que parece quando Chika Amagai é presa pelo assassinato brutal de cinco pessoas e é levada a uma prisão em uma ilha para estas assassinas!

altTitles.ja: サクランボッチ

description.en: Sakura, a girl who has difficulty making friends. Kayo, a girl belonging to a literature club of which she is the only member. Yuri, a girl who seems to have a kind of one-sided rivalry with Sakura. Koyuki, a girl with a rather quiet character. These girls with totally different personalities unexpectedly cross paths when all four join their school's literature club!
description.ja: 物事を深く考えすぎるがゆえに友達を作れない桜。そんな桜がある日出会ったのは、部員一人の文芸部部長・花陽。桜を一方的にライバル視するお嬢様・百合や心の声では多弁、現実は無口な後輩・小雪と、個性豊かな残念美少女たちが文芸部に大集結!?

altTitles.ja: メダリスト

description.en:
There is a dream worth putting two lives on the line for.  
  
Tsukasa, a young man with shattered dreams, and Inori, a girl no one believed in. However, in the face of adversity, those two possessed a tenacity towards the rink greater than anyone had ever known. Together, they meet on the ice, and aim for the world with their figure skating!

---

**Links:**  
- [Series' Twitter](https://twitter.com/medalist_AFT)
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA (U.S. Only)](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10231/episode/318207), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/medalist/)
description.es:
Tsukasa es un patinador que, tras haber dejado atrás su sueño de convertirse en un atleta de élite por problemas económicos, trabaja realizando espectáculos de patinaje sobre hielo.

Pero todo cambia cuando conoce a Inori, una niña que acude a una pista de hielo a escondidas de su madre, aunque esta esté totalmente en contra de ello y todo el mundo piense que es tarde para ella, y que es demasiado inútil.

Así, gracias a la tenacidad que muestra Inori, Tsukasa decide convertirse en su entrenador y buscará ayudarla en el difícil mundo del patinaje artístico, prometiéndose que la llevará a la cima.
description.zh: 用利刃融化坚冰、开拓人生——！

description.en: There is no story to read here. (Interactive) This series contains themes regarding mental health and anxiety that may not be suitable for all readers. Viewer discretion is advised. If you or someone you know is struggling or in crisis, please reach out for help at [Crisis Text Line](http://crisistextline.org/).
description.ur:
یہ ایک ایسے شخص کے بارے میں ہے جو کہ ایک خالی خلہ میں پھنسا ہوا ہے اور وہ تمھاری موجودگی بالکل بھی نہیں چاہتا۔۔۔
اِسے نہ پڑھو

title.en: I Am the Youngest Daughter of Murim’s Strongest, the Namgung Clan

altTitles.en: Youngest Daughter of the Ultimate Martial Master Namgung Family

description.en:
"B-baa, baaah?! (Did I become a baby?! What about my revenge?!)
Everyone in the Namgung family despised me. My life was one where even my siblings turned their backs on me.
But at the moment when the family was annihilated, the choice my siblings made… was not the family, but me.

‘I never once thought of you as anything but family.’
‘Live. Even if it’s disgraceful and filthy, live, Ahee.’

Why did they save me?
A question I held in my heart my entire life as I carried out my revenge.
I thought I could finally close my eyes at the end of it all.

‘Baaah?’

I’ve returned to the past!
Could this be some black magic from the Blood Cult?
My… my revenge? My peaceful rest?!
And why are the Namgung siblings clinging to me again?!

What on earth is going on?!"

altTitles.th: ยอดเชฟของโนบุนางะ

altTitles.ja: 信長のシェフ

description.en: Ken is a modern-day chef who wakes up one morning in war-torn 16th century Japan. Faced with an impossible situation, he does what he does best – he cooks. Soon, word of his wonderful food reaches the capital, and the ears of warlord Oda Nobunaga, who immediately orders Ken to cook for him. What will happen to Ken as he finds himself stumbling around in an era he doesn't belong?
description.ja: 現代の料理人・ケン。彼が目を覚ますとそこは戦国時代だった。京で評判の料理の噂を聞きつけた信長は、強引にケンを自分の料理人にするが…！？
description.es-la: Ken es un chef de la actualidad. Cuando se despierta, se encuentra en el período de los Estados en Guerra, la era Sengoku. Nobunaga oye un rumor sobre un plato con buena reputación en Kioto, y obliga a Ken a convertirse en su propio chef...
description.pt-br: Ken, um chef da era moderna, encontra-se de volta ao século 16, durante o período Sengoku. Sem qualquer lembrança de quem ele foi um dia ou como chegou ali, ele só pode contar com seu conhecimento e suas habilidades na culinárias. Mas, assim que ele ganha reputação por sua incrível comida, o próprio Oda Nobunaga aparece para demandar seus serviços.

altTitles.ja: ペット

description.en: The story revolves around people who possess the ability to infiltrate human minds and manipulate memories. Their powers have been used in the underworld for covering up accidents, assassinations, and all manner of crimes. But these powers not only destroy others' spirits, but also corrupt the users' own hearts…

altTitles.ja: そうしそうあい

description.en:
In a world where opposites attract, a chance encounter sparks a connection between a serious black-haired girl and a charismatic blond delinquent, painting a cute tale of young love and friendships. As the series unfolds, their seemingly carefree lives take unexpected turns, delving into the shadows that haunt their lives. 

An artful blend of laughter and heartfelt moments, this manga tells about the complexities of youth, friendship, and your past catching up to you.

altTitles.ja: となりの黒川さん

description.en:
_The secret between me and her is trivial yet important._

Hajime Takahashi, enrolled in Shuubi High School solely because it's the sacred place of his favorite manga. Everywhere in the school are locations that appeared in the manga, and he's super excited! Amidst this excitement, Takahashi meets a beautiful girl, Yayoi Kurokawa, who looks just like the heroine from his favorite work, and they come to share a certain secret.
description.ja: 僕と彼女の秘密は、些細だけど大切で。大好きな漫画の聖地、それだけが理由で秀美高校に入学した主人公・高橋一。学内はどこに行っても作品に出てきた聖地だらけで大興奮！そんな中、高橋は大好きな作品のヒロインそっくりな美少女・黒川弥生と出会い、とある秘密を共有することに――。不器用な2人が織りなす甘酸っぱくて、ニヤニヤしちゃう青春ラブコメ‼
description.vi: Bí mật giữa mình và cậu ấy tuy bình thường nhưng quan trọng!Hajime Takahashi nhập học tại trường cao trung Shuubi chỉ vì nơi đó là thánh địa trong bộ truyện tranh cậu yêu thích. Tất cả mọi ngóc ngách của trường đều được phác họa trong bộ truyện, điều đó khiến cậu phấn khích tột cùng! Giữa không khí hào hứng, Takahashi gặp một cô gái xinh đẹp giống hệt nữ chính trong tác phẩm yêu thích của mình, Yayoi Kurokawa, và họ đã sẻ chia bí mật của bản thân với nhau.

title.en: Kanojo to Kare no Kankei ~Heibon na Hayakawa-san to Heibon na Miura-kun no Hibon na Kankei~

altTitles.ja: 彼女と彼の関係 〜平凡な早川さんと平凡な三浦くんの非凡な関係〜

description.en:
"I wish I had a girlfriend, I don't even care who—"
"Really? Anybody? Even me?"

Kaho, who has never had a boyfriend before, wanted to have a male-female relationship.
Takumi, who wanted a girlfriend, just happened to be talking about it in front of her.

---
Alternate Raws: [Pixiv Comic](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/8556)
description.ja:
「誰でもいいから、彼女になってくれんかねー」
「本当に誰でもいい？　私でも？」

男女交際に興味があるのに、彼氏はいたことがない高校２年生の早川夏帆。ある日、同級生の三浦拓海が彼女を欲しがっていることを知って、勢い余ってその場で交際を申し込んでしまった！履歴書で自己紹介、「恋人とやりたいことリスト」の共有、初めてのふれあい――。二人の不思議な関係は「お試し交際」を通じて段々深まっていって……!?
description.pt-br:
"Eu quero tanto uma namorada que me contentaria com qualquer uma a esta altura." 
"Sério? Qualquer uma? Até mesmo eu?" 

Kaho, que nunca teve um namorado antes, queria entrar em um relacionamento entre um homem e mulher.
Takumi, que queria uma namorada, por acaso estava falando sobre isso na frente dela. Uma história de amor emocionante sobre amadurecimento!

altTitles.en: Ah, Hang on a Little Longer, My Lord

altTitles.ja: お待ちください、領主様！

altTitles.es: Ah, por favor sea paciente, ¡mi señor!

description.en:
Rose is the ruler of the dominion of ‘White’, a small and poor land. She was getting along with her citizens and living a quaint, favorable life until foreign migrants kept increasing and she got involved in some odd situations?! The lively, entertaining, romance, fantasy story of a super OP ruler Rose and Yggdrasil, the grand sorcerer who wants to hide her away and protect her!

---
When the Kingdom of White was conquered 500 years ago, the king and his subjects were exiled to a small tract of wasteland covered in ice. There they endured cold and hunger, relying on the magic of Archmage Yggdrasil to build the world’s smallest self-governing territory. As the last heir to her family, Rose now rules over this land as its lord. Rescuing former citizens who have fallen prey to trafficking abroad, she pours her heart and soul into making them thrive at home. But first things first, she must fill up the treasury to fund this mission! The business-savvy lord invites dragons, dwarfs, and elves to join in the effort, turning White into a haven for all races. Yggdrasil couldn’t be prouder of this utopia in the making, but will Lord Rose ever get to leave her money troubles behind?

---
**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/patience-my-lady)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/qingrenrenwodelingzhudaren/list?title_no=1815)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/lord-calmdown/list?title_no=3578)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001625)
description.ko:
작고 가난한 영지 ‘화이트’의 영주, 로즈.
영주민들과 오순도순 잘 먹고 잘살고 싶었는데, 갑자기 이종족 이주민이 늘고 자꾸 사건에 휘말린다?! 
막강 능력 영주님 ‘로즈’와 그녀를 영지에 몰래몰래 숨겨 놓고 보호하고픈 스승, ‘대마법사 이그드라실’의 유쾌 발랄 로맨스 판타지!

---
**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/patience-my-lady)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/qingrenrenwodelingzhudaren/list?title_no=1815)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/lord-calmdown/list?title_no=3578)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001625)
description.tr:
Rose, küçük ve fakir bir bölge olan White'ın hükümdarıdır. Göçmenlerin artmasına
ve garip olaylara dahil oluncaya kadar halkıyla iyi anlaşıyor ve hoş, güzel bir hayat yaşıyordu.
Güçlü ve yetenekli hükümdar Rose ve onu gizleyip korumak isteyen Usta Sihirbaz Yggdrasil'in heyecanlı,
eğlenceli, aşk ve fantazi hikayesi!
description.zh:
活泼领主X超强大魔法师！
充满惊喜的领地生活开始！
露丝·白是贫寒的白领地领主，她的身边有大魔法师伊格·德拉希尔辅佐。身为白的老师，他担任着领地的各种职务。为了领地的繁荣露丝不断尝试各种冒险，然而异族渐渐踏入领地，也因此带来各种问题...乐天女领主该如果解决迎面而来的难题呢？

---
**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/patience-my-lady)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/qingrenrenwodelingzhudaren/list?title_no=1815)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/lord-calmdown/list?title_no=3578)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001625)
description.zh-hk:
狹小又貧脊的「白色領地」領主——羅茲，夢想與領地居民一起和睦生活，卻因為異族移民增加，不斷捲入各種事件。 具有強大力量的領主羅茲，與在背後默默守護領地與羅茲的師傅——大魔法師 伊克德雷瑟將會展開什麼歡樂的浪漫奇幻故事？

---
**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/patience-my-lady)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/qingrenrenwodelingzhudaren/list?title_no=1815)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/lord-calmdown/list?title_no=3578)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001625)

altTitles.ja: リィンカーネーションの花弁

description.en: Striving for talent, Senji Touya tries everything he can so he can find it. Kendou, dancing, swimming, basketball, soccer, chess… anything he tries, he fails to exceed it. One day, his classmate, Haito, came to school for once in a long time. Senji refers to her as someone who "has it" or someone who has talent. Later on, he found out that she isn't just someone who has talent, but someone who "took" the talent of herself in her past life. And, those who "took" the talent from their past lives, are also known as "Returners"…
description.vi: Cố gắng tìm kiếm tài năng, Senji Touya thử mọi thứ có thể để tìm ra nó. Kiếm đạo, nhảy múa, bơi lội, bóng rổ, bóng đá, cờ vua… bất cứ thứ gì cậu thử, cậu đều không thể vượt trội. Một ngày nọ, cô bạn cùng lớp của cậu, Haito, tới trường sau một thời gian dài vắng mặt. Senji coi cô là người "có nó" – một người có tài năng. Sau đó, cậu phát hiện ra rằng cô không chỉ là một người có tài năng mà còn là người đã "lấy" tài năng của mình từ kiếp trước. Và, những người "lấy" tài năng từ kiếp trước của họ còn được gọi là "Những Kẻ Trở Lại"…
description.pt-br: Na busca por um talento só seu, Senji Touya tenta de tudo para encontrá-lo. Kendou, dança, natação, basquete, futebol, xadrez… em tudo o que ele tenta, ele não consegue se destacar. Um dia, sua colega de classe, Haito, vem à escola pela primeira vez em muito tempo. Senji se refere a ela como alguém que “possui algo” ou alguém que tem um verdadeiro talento. Mais tarde, ele descobriu que ela não é apenas alguém que tem talento, mas alguém que “conseguiu” o talento de si mesma através de sua vida passada. E, aqueles que “conseguem” o talento de suas vidas passadas, também são conhecidos como “Reencarnados” …

altTitles.ja: カーストロマンス

description.en: Jin Daim has no friends, but likes drawing. Iljina is the most popular girl in school, even though she rejects every confession. Daim thinks she and her friends are an annoyance and disturbs his drawing time before class, but all he ever draws is her. Things get complicated when his secret sketch books gets discovered by one of Iljina's friends.

altTitles.ja: 理解のあるカレンちゃん

description.en:
"You're amazing for being alive another day!"

A Manga about an understanding girlfriend who rewards you with a "log-in bonus" every day.
description.pt-br:
“Você é incrível por estar vivo mais um dia!”

Um mangá sobre uma namorada compreensiva que recompensa você com um “bônus de login” todos os dias.

altTitles.ja: 忘却バッテリー

description.en:
Two geniuses who made a name for themselves in the middle school baseball world but had distanced themselves from baseball have serendipitously come together at an obsecure public high school in Tokyo.

Kiyomine Haruka, a pitcher with a flawless, powerful arm. His battery partner, the shrewd catcher known as the 'General', Kaname Kei (who's currently a complete amateur due to memory loss!). And then there are those who once fell in defeat to these two...

Their paths have crossed once more, and now their high school baseball story begins anew, springing into action!
description.ja:
中学球界で名を馳せるも野球から遠ざかっていた天才たちが都立の野球無名高校で偶然集結。

完全無欠の剛腕投手・清峰葉流火（きよみねはるか）。その相方（バッテリー）、切れ者捕手の“智将”要圭（記憶喪失により現在、素人！）。そして、かつて2人に敗れ散った者たち…

巡り合い、再び動き出す彼らの高校野球ストーリーがいま始まる!

altTitles.th: เชิญร่ำสุรา

description.en: The Six Prefectures of Zhongbo were ceded away in surrender to the external enemies, and Shen Zechuan was taken into custody in the capital, reduced to a drowning dog loathed and condemned by all. Xiao Chiye followed the scent of the furor and made his way over. But instead of setting others on him, he kicked Shen Zechuan with his very own leg that rendered the latter an invalid. Who would expect this invalid to turn around and bite him in a counterattack until he was all drenched in blood? That was the start of an epic feud between both men who tear at each other every time they come face-to-face with one another.
description.pl:
Shen Zechuan jest ósmym synem zdradzieckiego księcia Jianxing, człowieka, który skazał swoje miasta i ludzi na zagładę z rąk wroga. Jako jedyny żyjący członek swojej linii, Shen Zechuan jest znienawidzony przez cały naród. A nienawiść nikogo nie płonie goręcej niż uczucie Xiao Chiye, najmłodszego syna potężnego księcia Libei.

Xiao Chiye niczego nie pragnie bardziej niż śmierci Shen Zechuana, ale ten wbrew wszelkim przeciwnościom trzyma się życia. Zamiast poddać się hańbie swojej rodziny, staje się cierniem w boku Xiao Chiye, wdzierając się do bezwzględnego świata politycznego stolicy. Jednak gdy ci dwaj zaciekli wrogowie walczą z więzami swojego losu, zostają przyciągnięci do siebie siłą, której żaden z nich się nie spodziewa — i żaden z nich nie może mieć nadziei, że się jej oprze.

title.en: I Took Over The System Players

description.en: College student, Xing Ye gained the ability to take over another person’s body with a success rate of 100%, but by chance took over the body of a necromancer. This necromancer turns out to be the owner of the system, and it’s all because of this system that he’s a corpse after dying. This system gives suicide missions with no regards of the host’s abilities, but Xing Ye finds this suicide system quite compatible with him now that he’s a corpse? “Hahaha, I’m already dead, what do I have to fear?”
description.zh: 大学生星夜死后获得百分百夺舍能力，却意外夺舍炼尸，而这炼尸生前竟然是系统持有者，之所以死亡变成炼尸都是被他的系统害得，这系统会不顾宿主等级的派发作死任务，但星夜发现身为炼尸的自己和这作死系统竟意外的有配合？哈哈哈，老子已经死了还怕什么作死

title.en: Apparently, Disillusioned Adventurers Will Save the World

altTitles.ja-ro: Ningen Fushin no Boukenshatachi ga Sekai o Sukuu Youdesu

altTitles.en: It Seems Skeptical Adventurers Will Save the World

altTitles.id: Petualang Yang Tidak Percaya Pada Manusia Akan Menyelamatkan Dunia

altTitles.zh: 不相信人类的冒险者们好像要去拯救世界

altTitles.zh-hk: 不相信人類的冒險者們好像要去拯救世界

altTitles.ja: 人間不信の冒険者たちが世界を救うようです

altTitles.en: Adventurers Who Don't Believe in Humanity Will Save the World

altTitles.ja-ro: Ningen Fushin no Boukensha-tachi ga Sekai wo Sukuu you desu

altTitles.vi: Có Vẻ Nhóm Mạo Hiểm Giả Không Tin Vào Nhân Loại Sẽ Giải Cứu Thế Giới

description.en: Life isn’t going well for veteran adventurer Nick. Despite his loyalty to his party, he was betrayed by a teammate who accused him of embezzlement, then kicked out by his mentor. On top of that, his girlfriend dumped him too! Tired, heartbroken, and looking for a drink, Nick chances upon a few kindred spirits who are as jaded as he is. Can these disillusioned heroes put their faith in each other long enough to save the world together…?
description.vi: Đây là câu chuyện về bốn nhà phiêu lưu đã từng bị phản bội và trải qua rất nhiều sóng gió cuộc đời. Họ tụ họp lại và hợp tác với nhau để có thể ‘giơ ngón giữa’ trước xã hội đương thời
description.pt-br: A história de quatro aventureiros, todos que experimentaram traição e dificuldades, unindo-se em um "que se foda" a sociedade.

altTitles.ja: ドラマクイン

description.en: After saving Earth, aliens have taken up residence with the humans in Japan. Nomamoto, a factory worker with an abusive alien boss, one day meets Kitami, who tells her his own family was killed by aliens. The two quickly forge a friendship, but one day Kitami does the unthinkable…
description.ja: <毎週月曜更新>宇宙人が地球を救ってから、人間と宇宙人が共に住むようになった日本。工場で宇宙人の上司にこき使われるノマモトは、家族を宇宙人に殺されたという北見と出会う。仲を深める2人だが、ある日北見がとんでもないことをしてしまい…
description.ru: Пришельцы спасли Землю и обосновались с людьми в Японии. Номамото, работающая на фабрике с отвратительным боссом-пришельцем, однажды встречает Китами, который рассказывает ей, что семью его убили пришельцы. Между ними быстро возникает дружба, но однажды Китами совершает немыслимое...
description.pt-br: Após salvar a Terra, os alienígenas passaram a viver com os humanos no Japão. Nomamoto, uma operária de fábrica com um chefe alienígena abusivo, um dia conhece Kitami, que conta que sua própria família foi morta por alienígenas. Os dois rapidamente formam uma amizade, mas um dia Kitami faz o impensável…

title.en: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: SatoruCie (Doujinshi)

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Satoru x Ciel Fan Manga
Regarding Reincarnated to Slime: Satoru x Ciel Fan Manga

description.en:
**Web Novel Spoilers Warning: The story takes place on Earth after end of the Web Novel.**

---

Rimuru plants a parallel existance inside Satoru Mikami, to live his life with Ciel and finish his missions he was unable to when he first died.

altTitles.ja: 師匠、あと49回死んでください

description.en:
When the powerless thirteenth prince became emperor, he gave his tutor, Yo Yohwa, poison. His reason being his death at the hands of his own master in countless previous lives. The poisoned Yo Yohwa then regresses to an earlier time together with the prince and is determined to get on his good side this time in order to escape. However, the prince already discovered the truth…

“This is crazy. You killed me in the previous lives, and you neglected me in another. Now you’re acting all nice. Are you trying to get away?”

altTitles.en: An Angel Flew Down to Me!

altTitles.ja: 私に天使が舞い降りた!

description.en: The four-panel comedy manga's story centers on Miyako Hoshino, a shy college student and otaku. Miyako's younger sister Hinata, who is a fifth grader, has a classmate and friend named Hana. When they meet, Miyako falls for Hana at first sight.
description.es-la: La historia de este manga cómico 4-Koma se centra en Miyako Hoshino, una tímida estudiante universitaria y otaku. La hermana pequeña de Miyako, Hinata, que está en quinto grado, tiene una compañera de clase y amiga llamada Hana. Cuando se conocen, Miyako se enamora de Hana a primera vista...

altTitles.ja: ソードアート・オンライン・ユナイタル・リング

description.en: A year has passed since Kirito and Asuna’s return from the Underworld. With them is Alice, who has been given a physical body. But their peace is quickly broken when the three are suddenly thrust into an unfamiliar game, Unital Ring. This new world is a survival MMO that fuses together every VRMMO created with the Seed program. As soon as it starts, Kirito finds himself with nothing but his underwear. Now, he’s got to challenge a mysterious VRMMOSVG under desperate circumstances!
description.es-la: Ha pasado un año desde el regreso de Kirito y Asuna del Underworld. Con ellos está Alice, que ha recibido un cuerpo físico. Pero su paz se rompe rápidamente cuando los tres se ven empujados de repente a un juego desconocido, Unital Ring. Este nuevo mundo es un MMO de supervivencia que fusiona todos los VRMMO creados con el programa "The Seed". Nada más empezar, Kirito se encuentra sin nada más que su ropa interior. Ahora, ¡Tiene que desafiar a un misterioso VRMMOSVG en circunstancias desesperadas!

altTitles.ja: 魔法少女あキララ☆
悩める彼は魔法少女

description.en: He became a magical girl, and his magical girl form fell in love with his buddy.

altTitles.ja: 川柳少女

description.en:
Yukishiro Nanako is a cute, cheerful high school girl with one peculiar trait: instead of verbal communication, she writes senryu (a type of haiku) poems to relay her thoughts. Together with ex-delinquent Busujima Eiji, they are budding freshmen of the school's Literature Club.  
  
Even though Nanako doesn't talk, with the power of senryu, the adorable pair has no problem enjoying their fun school-life through the tune of 5-7-5 syllables.  


---
description.ru:
Юкиширо Нанако - милая и весёлая старшеклассница со специфичной чертой в общении: чтобы передать свои мысли, она пишет сэнрю (как хайку). Нанако вместе с бывшим хулиганом Бусуджимой Эйджи становятся новыми членами литературного клуба. И пусть девушка так странно разговаривает, но благодаря силе сэнрю эта прелестная пара без проблем наслаждается школьной жизнью.   
  
[Artist's twitter](https://twitter.com/igagarashi)
description.pt-br:
Yukishiro Nanako é uma colegial fofa e alegre com uma característica peculiar: em vez de comunicação verbal, ela escreve poemas senryuu (um tipo de haiku) para transmitir seus pensamentos. Junto com o ex-delinquente Busujima Eiji, eles são calouros iniciantes do Clube de Literatura da escola.

Embora Nanako não fale, com o poder do senryuu, o adorável par não tem problemas em aproveitar sua divertida vida escolar através da melodia de 5-7-5 sílabas.

description.en:
Two childhood friends—Black, an emotional fashion designer with selective amnesia, and White, a rational writer who’s been absent for two years—reunite to confront their traumatic pasts and navigate the fragile space between heart and mind as they struggle to preserve their friendship on the brink of adulthood.
Grey is... is a deeply emotional coming-of-age series about the messy journey of self-discovery, about friendship, and about the delicate balance between emotion and reason.
